title: Blue Neon
description: Motion blur and blue light traces create ethereal atmospheres. A photographic exploration of movement frozen in electric glow.

title: Dark Movement
description: Bodies in motion captured through darkness and shadow. Dance between visibility and obscurity.

title: Disappearance
description: Soft portraits exploring vulnerability and stillness. Moments of quiet introspection captured in delicate light.

title: Hot Tribal
description: Warm tones and primal energy. A visual journey through raw expression and ancestral echoes.

title: Kitsune
description: Mythological imagery meets contemporary vision. Figures emerging from nature's embrace, between reality and folklore.

title: Lumen
description: Light as subject and medium. Experimental captures exploring luminosity, reflections and optical phenomena.

title: Purple Unhuman
description: Violet hues and distorted forms challenge human representation. Identity dissolves into chromatic abstraction.

title: Red Movement
description: Kinetic energy captured in red. Motion studies where bodies become fluid gestures in space.

title: Self Portrait
description: Double exposure and layered identity. The self fragmented, multiplied, seeking definition through the lens.

title: Shadow Face
description: Faces half-hidden in shadow. Portraits that reveal through concealment, exploring the duality of presence.

title: Unpersonalization
description: The erasure of individual features. A study on anonymity and the dissolution of personal identity in the digital age.
